title: "Neural Net Art"
content:
Welcome to our website! ðŸŽ‰

We are a platform that celebrates the beauty of neural networks through art. Our simple graphic of a neural network against complementary colors is just one example of the many stunning pieces you'll find here.

Our collection features a variety of styles, from abstract to realistic, and showcases the intricate patterns and connections that make up these fascinating systems. Whether you're a fan of technology or simply appreciate the aesthetics, we hope you'll enjoy browsing our selection.

All of our wallpapers are available for free download, so feel free to use them as your desktop background or phone wallpaper. And if you're an artist yourself, we encourage you to submit your own neural network-inspired creations to be featured on our site.

Thank you for visiting, and we hope you find inspiration in our collection of neural net art! ðŸŽ¨

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a neural network, against a background of complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
